document_title: Eclampsia: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
To prevent dangerous complications of the disease, it is recommended that pregnant women diagnosed with preeclampsia should pay attention to the following issues:
Carry out regular and scheduled prenatal check-ups, especially important prenatal check-up milestones; Have a scientific diet, supplemented with nutrients for pregnant mothers and fetuses to develop well.; Monitor and record changes in blood pressure, weight, urine, etc. daily to detect abnormalities early; Notify your doctor immediately when your body has unusual symptoms for timely treatment.
Establish a scientific nutritional regimen to provide adequate nutrition during pregnancy
